paragraphs: Todd is a multi-strategy generative agriculture firm, pursuing superior long-term farm value to our clients.
We bring together extraordinary people, equip them with unmatched resources and technology and empower them to seek new possibilities in sustainable farming.

Our firm deploys resources to support promising farms whose innovations are changing the world—propelling a virtuous cycle of improved soil quality and healthier produce. Our agronomy team supports the critical mission of the world’s food producers, from renowned coastal farms to mountainous hollows.

culture.description: We’ve built a distinctive culture that shapes everything we do—whether we’re working, socializing or supporting our communities. Our leadership shares a determination and responsibility for growing and developing our next generation of leaders.

competencies.title: Todd is differentiated by a combination of three core competencies
items: Understanding of Modern Consumer Demands and Channels
Positioned at the Frontier of Sustainable Agriculture
